name: Traffic Cop
description: It's the 1950s in a city like no other. You're on duty as the local Traffic Cop smack dab in the middle of a busy intersection. Direct traffic, dodge flying food, & unlock bonus rounds to disintegrate aliens, and hunt birds!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i5-4590 equivalent or greater Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD equivalent or greater Storage: 2 GB available space Additional Notes: VR Headset required, 2x USB 3.0 ports
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i7-6700K equivalent or greater Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 980 / AMD equivalent or greater Storage: 2 GB available space Additional Notes: VR Headset required, 2x USB 3.0 ports
